upgrade.title: Upgrade Your Device
upgrade.description: Trade in your current phone and get extra credit toward your next purchase of a new or refurbished device.
upgrade.subtitle: Get the Latest Technology
upgrade.benefit1: Get instant credit toward a new device
upgrade.benefit2: Enjoy special discounts on new purchases
upgrade.benefit3: Free data transfer to your new device
upgrade.step1Desc: Tell us about your current device to get an estimated trade-in value.
upgrade.step2Desc: Browse our collection of latest devices and select your upgrade.
upgrade.step3Desc: Bring your old device to our store or mail it in and receive your new one.
upgrade.whyUpgradeSubtitle: See how the latest devices compare to your current phone with these key improvements

faqQuestions.q1: How do you determine the value of my current device?
faqQuestions.a1: We evaluate devices based on the model, condition, storage capacity, and current market value. Factors like screen condition, functionality of buttons and cameras, and general wear and tear are all considered in our assessment.
faqQuestions.q2: Can I trade in a device with a cracked screen?
faqQuestions.a2: Yes! We accept devices with cracked screens and other imperfections. While these issues will affect the trade-in value, you can still get credit toward your new device purchase.
faqQuestions.q3: How long does the upgrade process take?
faqQuestions.a3: The entire process typically takes between 30-60 minutes if done in-store, including device evaluation, data transfer, and setting up your new phone. If you choose to mail in your device, processing may take 3-5 business days after we receive it.
faqQuestions.q4: What should I do before trading in my device?
faqQuestions.a4: We recommend backing up your data, signing out of all accounts, disabling any security features, and performing a factory reset if possible. Our staff can assist you in-store with these steps.
faqQuestions.q5: Can I upgrade to any device or only specific models?
faqQuestions.a5: You can upgrade to any new or refurbished device in our inventory. Your trade-in credit will be applied to the purchase regardless of which model you select.

upgrade.ctaSubtitle: Get started today and enjoy the benefits of the latest technology with our hassle-free upgrade process.

comparison.oldFeature2: Limited battery life that deteriorates over time
comparison.oldFeature3: Basic camera functionality with lower resolution
comparison.oldFeature5: May no longer receive security updates
comparison.newFeature1: Lightning-fast processing speed with latest chipsets
comparison.newFeature2: All-day battery life with fast charging capabilities
comparison.newFeature3: Advanced camera systems with AI-powered photography
comparison.newFeature5: Regular security updates and latest OS features

recycle.title: Recycle Your Old Tech
recycle.description: Help reduce e-waste by trading in your old devices. We'll ensure they're properly recycled or refurbished for reuse.
recycle.subtitle: Responsibly Dispose of Your Electronics
recycle.benefit1: Free recycling of all electronic devices
recycle.benefit2: Secure data wiping on all devices
recycle.environmentalDesc: Prevent harmful materials from ending up in landfills and reduce the need for raw material mining.
recycle.certifiedDesc: Our recycling partners follow strict environmental guidelines and data security protocols.
recycle.freePickupDesc: We offer convenient pickup options for multiple devices, making recycling effortless for you.
recycle.faq1Answer: We accept smartphones, tablets, laptops, desktop computers, monitors, printers, keyboards, mice, gaming consoles, digital cameras, and other consumer electronics.
recycle.faq2: Is there a cost to recycle my devices?
recycle.faq2Answer: No, our electronics recycling program is completely free for consumers. We cover all costs associated with recycling your devices.
recycle.faq3Answer: All devices undergo certified data wiping procedures that meet industry standards. For devices with non-functioning memory components, physical destruction is used to ensure data cannot be recovered.
recycle.faq4: Do I need to remove batteries before recycling?
recycle.faq4Answer: No, you don't need to remove batteries. Our recycling partners are equipped to safely handle and process batteries as part of our recycling program.
recycle.faq5: What happens to my device after recycling?
recycle.faq5Answer: Devices are disassembled and sorted into different material categories (metals, plastics, glass, etc.). These materials are then processed and used to manufacture new products, reducing the need for raw materials.
recycle.stat1Desc: Recycling one million cell phones can recover approximately 35,000 lbs of copper, 772 lbs of silver, 75 lbs of gold, and 33 lbs of palladium.
recycle.stat2Desc: Global e-waste reached 53.6 million metric tons in 2019, and only 17.4% was properly recycled. Your contribution helps increase this percentage.
recycle.stat3Desc: Recycling electronics uses significantly less energy than mining and processing raw materials for new devices.
recycle.ctaTitle: Ready to Responsibly Recycle Your Device?
recycle.ctaText: Join thousands of environmentally conscious consumers who've already made a difference by recycling their electronics with us.
recycle.step1Desc: Tell us what devices you want to recycle using our easy online form. We accept phones, tablets, laptops, and other electronics.
recycle.step2Desc: Choose whether you'd like us to pick up the device from your location or if you prefer to drop it off at one of our recycling centers.
recycle.step3Desc: All devices undergo certified data wiping procedures to ensure your personal information is completely removed and unrecoverable.
recycle.step4Desc: Your devices are broken down and recycled following strict environmental standards. We'll send you a certificate of recycling upon completion.

tradeIn.step2Desc: Bring your device to our store or request a free shipping label.
tradeIn.step3Desc: Get a certificate confirming your device was recycled responsibly.

policy.title: Shipping & Delivery Policy
policy.subtitle: Information about our shipping options, timing, and policies
policy.standardDomesticDescription: Our standard shipping option provides reliable delivery at affordable rates for all domestic orders.
policy.expressDomesticDescription: Need your items quickly? Choose our express delivery option for faster service.
policy.standardInternationalDescription: We ship to most countries worldwide with our standard international service.
policy.expressInternationalDescription: Get faster delivery to international destinations with our express service.
policy.processingTimeDescription: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days after payment confirmation. During peak seasons or promotional periods, processing may take an additional 1-2 business days.
policy.trackingDescription: A tracking number will be provided via email once your order has been shipped. You can use this to monitor the status of your delivery.
policy.restrictionsDescription: Some products cannot be shipped to certain locations due to local regulations. We'll notify you if there are any restrictions for your order.
policy.internationalDescription: We ship to most countries worldwide. International customers are responsible for all duties, import taxes, and customs fees that may be incurred.
policy.customsNote: International shipments may be subject to customs inspection and potential delays. Import duties and taxes are the responsibility of the recipient and are not included in the shipping cost.

faq1.question: How can I track my order?
faq1.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a confirmation email with tracking information. You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

faq2.question: What if my package is damaged or missing items?
faq2.answer: Please contact our customer service within 48 hours of receiving your package if it arrives damaged or is missing items. We'll work quickly to resolve the issue.

faq3.question: Do you ship to P.O. boxes?
faq3.answer: Yes, we do ship to P.O. boxes for standard shipping options, but express shipping requires a physical address for delivery.

faq4.question: How are shipping costs calculated?
faq4.answer: Shipping costs are calculated based on the weight of your order, the shipping method selected, and your delivery location. The exact cost will be displayed at checkout before you complete your purchase.

repair.faqRepairTimeQuestion: How long does a typical repair take?
repair.faqRepairTimeAnswer: Most repairs are completed within 24-48 hours depending on parts availability and the complexity of the repair. Some common repairs like screen replacements can often be completed same-day.
repair.faqDelayQuestion: What if my repair is taking longer than expected?
repair.faqDelayAnswer: If your repair requires special parts or faces unexpected complications, it may take longer. We'll always notify you if there's a delay and provide an updated timeline.
repair.faqCompleteNotificationQuestion: How will I know when my repair is complete?
repair.faqCompleteNotificationAnswer: We'll notify you via email and text message when your repair is complete. You can also check the status anytime on this page using your repair ID.
repair.contactSupportMessage: If you need assistance with your repair or have questions about our services, please contact our customer support team.

confirmation.verificationSuccessMessage: Thank you for verifying your email. We have received your contact request and will get back to you shortly.
confirmation.verificationErrorMessage: We couldn't verify your contact request. The verification link may have expired or is invalid. Please try submitting your message again.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
terms.introduction: Welcome to FinOpenPOS. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services. By accessing this website and using our services, we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full. Do not continue to use FinOpenPOS's website and services if you do not accept all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
terms.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: By creating an account on our website, placing an order through our platform, or otherwise accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
section1.content2: If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website or services.

section2.title: 2. User Accounts
section2.content1: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for restricting access to your computer.
section2.content2: You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account. If you believe there has been unauthorized use of your account, you must notify us immediately.

section3.title: 3. Products and Services
section3.content1: All products and services are subject to availability. We reserve the right to discontinue any product or service at any time.
section3.content2: We strive to display as accurately as possible the colors and features of our products. We cannot guarantee that your device's display accurately reflects the actual color of the products.

list.item1: Product descriptions and specifications are subject to change without notice.
list.item2: Prices are subject to change without notice.
list.item3: We reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer.
list.item4: All descriptions of products and services are subject to change at any time without notice, at our sole discretion.

section4.title: 4. Orders and Payment
section4.content1: When placing an order, you agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel your order at any time for reasons including but not limited to product availability, errors in product or pricing information, or problems identified by our credit and fraud avoidance department.
section4.content2: All payments must be made in full before the delivery of products or services. We accept various payment methods which are specified on our website.

section5.title: 5. Shipping and Delivery
section5.content1: For detailed information about our shipping methods, estimated delivery times and associated costs, please refer to our Shipping Policy.
section5.content2: We are not liable for delivery delays caused by circumstances beyond our control, such as customs processing, natural disasters, severe weather conditions, or carrier delays.

section6.title: 6. Returns and Refunds
section6.content1: Our Return and Refund Policy outlines the procedures and conditions for returning products and receiving refunds. By placing an order with us, you agree to the terms specified in this policy.
section6.content2: We reserve the right to reject returns that do not comply with our return policy.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content1: All content included on this website, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of FinOpenPOS or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws.
section7.content2: You may not reproduce, distribute, display, sell, lease, transmit, create derivative works from, translate, modify, reverse-engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise exploit this website or any portion of it without our explicit written consent.

section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
section8.content1: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the services.
section8.content2: Our total liability for all claims arising from or related to the services is limited to the greater of: (a) the amount of fees you paid to us in the 12 months prior to the action giving rise to liability, or (b) €100.

section9.title: 9. Governing Law
section9.content1: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Belgium, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
section9.content2: Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Belgium.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and policies
faq.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you with any questions or concerns.

what.question: What is FinOpenPOS?
what.answer: FinOpenPOS is an open-source point of sale system designed specifically for phone repair shops and electronics retailers. Our platform offers comprehensive inventory management, repair tracking, customer management, and e-commerce functionality to help businesses operate more efficiently.

account.question: How do I create an account?
account.answer: To create an account, click the 'Register' button in the top right corner of the website. Fill in your details including name, email address, and password. You'll receive a confirmation email to verify your account before you can start using it.

login.question: How do I log in to my account?
login.answer: Click the 'Login' button in the top right corner of the website. Enter the email address and password you used when creating your account. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it by clicking the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.

password.question: How do I reset my password?
password.answer: If you've forgotten your password, click the 'Login' button and then select 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and you'll receive instructions on how to reset your password. For security reasons, the reset link expires after 24 hours.

track.question: How can I track my order?
track.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'My Orders' section. Click on the specific order you want to track, and you'll see the current status and tracking information. You can also track your order using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my order?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your order if it hasn't been shipped yet. Log into your account, go to 'My Orders', select the order you want to cancel, and click the 'Cancel Order' button. If the order has already been shipped, you'll need to initiate a return once you receive it.

modify.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
modify.answer: Limited modifications may be possible if the order hasn't been processed yet. Please contact our customer service team as soon as possible with your order number and the changes you'd like to make. We'll do our best to accommodate your request.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept major credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payment information is securely processed and encrypted. For certain regions, we also offer payment on delivery options.

time.question: How long will it take to receive my order?
time.answer: Domestic orders typically take 3-5 business days with standard shipping, or 1-2 business days with express shipping. International orders may take 7-14 business days depending on the destination country and customs processing. Please note that these are estimates and actual delivery times may vary.

cost.question: How much does shipping cost?
cost.answer: Standard domestic shipping costs €5.99 and is free for orders over €50. Express domestic shipping costs €12.99. International shipping starts at €15.99 for standard and €29.99 for express, with final costs depending on the destination country, package weight, and shipping method selected.

international.question: Do you ship internationally?
international.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International customers are responsible for all duties, import taxes, and customs fees that may apply. These additional charges are not included in the shipping cost and will be collected by the delivery service or customs office.

track.question: How can I track my shipment?
track.answer: Once your order is shipped, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. You can use this number on our website under 'My Orders' or directly on the carrier's website to track your package's journey and estimated delivery date.

policy.question: What is your return policy?
policy.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused, in their original packaging, and in the same condition as when you received them. Some products, such as software licenses or custom-made items, cannot be returned. Please refer to our Returns Policy page for complete details.

start.question: How do I start a return?
start.answer: To initiate a return, log into your account, go to 'My Orders', select the order containing the item you want to return, and click 'Return Items'. Follow the prompts to complete the return request. Once approved, you'll receive instructions on how to ship the item back to us.

refund.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
refund.answer: After we receive and inspect your return, we'll process your refund within 3-5 business days. The time it takes for the refund to appear in your account depends on your payment method: credit cards typically take 5-10 business days, while PayPal refunds are usually processed within 24-48 hours.

damage.question: What if I receive damaged or incorrect items?
damage.answer: If you receive damaged or incorrect items, please contact our customer service team within 48 hours of delivery. Take photos of the damaged items or packaging and include your order number in your message. We'll arrange for a replacement or refund as appropriate.

warranty.question: What warranty do your products have?
warranty.answer: Most of our products come with a standard manufacturer's warranty, typically ranging from 1 to 3 years depending on the item. Specific warranty information is listed on each product page. For warranty claims, you'll need to provide proof of purchase and the original packaging if possible.

availability.question: Can I be notified when an out-of-stock item is available?
availability.answer: Yes, on any out-of-stock product page, you'll find a 'Notify Me When Available' button. Enter your email address to receive an automatic notification when the item is back in stock. This service is free and you can unsubscribe from notifications at any time.

specs.question: Where can I find detailed product specifications?
specs.answer: Detailed product specifications are available on each product's page under the 'Specifications' tab. If you need additional information that isn't listed, please contact our customer service team and we'll be happy to provide more details.

compatibility.question: How can I check if a product is compatible with my device?
compatibility.answer: Product compatibility information is listed on each product page under the 'Compatibility' section. You can also use our compatibility checker tool by entering your device model to see all compatible products. If you're still unsure, our customer service team can help verify compatibility before you make a purchase.

service.question: What repair services do you offer?
service.answer: We offer a wide range of repair services for smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other electronic devices. Our services include screen replacements, battery replacements, water damage treatment, charging port repairs, camera replacements, software troubleshooting, and more. Visit our repairs page to see a full list of services for your specific device.

process.question: How does the repair process work?
process.answer: Our repair process is simple: 1) Schedule a repair appointment online or bring your device to our store, 2) Our technicians will diagnose the issue and provide a quote, 3) Upon your approval, we'll complete the repair, usually within the same day for most common issues, 4) You'll be notified when your device is ready for pickup or delivery.

warranty.question: Do you offer warranty on repairs?
warranty.answer: Yes, all of our repairs come with a 90-day warranty covering both parts and labor. If you experience the same issue within the warranty period, we'll fix it at no additional cost. Our warranty does not cover new damage, water damage, or software issues unrelated to the original repair.

time.question: How long do repairs take?
time.answer: Most common repairs like screen replacements, battery replacements, and charging port fixes are completed within 1-2 hours. More complex repairs may take up to 24-48 hours. For specialized repairs requiring parts to be ordered, we'll provide an estimated timeframe during the initial diagnosis.

cost.question: How much do your repair services cost?
cost.answer: Repair costs vary depending on your device model and the specific issue. We provide free diagnostics and will give you a transparent quote before proceeding with any repair. For common repairs, you can check our website for pricing or contact us for a personalized estimate.

track.question: How can I track the status of my repair?
track.answer: You can track your repair status by entering your repair ticket number on our website or by logging into your account. You'll also receive automated updates via email or SMS at each stage of the repair process, including when we receive your device, when we begin working on it, and when it's ready for pickup or delivery.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.introduction: At FinOpenPOS, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Notice
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. Some cookies are essential for the site to function, while others help us understand how you use the site and to provide personalized content and ads.
cookieConsent.preferencesDescription: Cookies help us deliver our services. By using our website, you agree to our use of cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences below.

summary1.title: Data We Collect
summary1.content: We collect personal information that you provide to us, automatically collected information about your device, and information from third parties.

summary2.title: How We Protect Your Data
summary2.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your data and never sell your personal information to third parties.

privacy.keyPoint1: We only collect data necessary to provide our services and improve your experience.
privacy.keyPoint2: Your data is securely stored and protected with industry-standard encryption.
privacy.keyPoint3: You have control over your information and can request access, correction, or deletion.
privacy.keyPoint4: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic.
privacy.keyPoint5: We only share your data with third parties when necessary to provide our services or when required by law.
privacy.keyPoint6: We comply with GDPR regulations for EU users and respect your enhanced data protection rights.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content1: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including information by which you may be personally identified, such as name, postal address, e-mail address, telephone number, and payment information ('personal data').
section1.content2: We collect this information directly from you when you provide it to us, automatically as you navigate through the site, and from third parties such as business partners and analytics providers.

list.item3: Payment information (e.g., credit card details, billing address)

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content1: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, personalize your experience, and comply with legal obligations.
section2.content2: We may also use your information to send you promotional communications about our products and services, but you can opt out of these communications at any time.

section3.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
section3.content1: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who help us operate our business, with your consent, or as required by law.
section3.content2: We may also share aggregated or anonymized information that does not directly identify you with third parties for marketing, advertising, or research purposes.

section4.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section4.content1: We use cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze trends, administer the website, track users' movements around the website, and gather demographic information about our user base as a whole.
section4.content2: You can control cookies through your browser settings and other tools. However, if you block certain cookies, you may not be able to use some features of our website.
section4.cookiesDescription: We use different types of cookies for various purposes:

cookieTypes.essentialDesc: Required for the website to function properly
cookieTypes.statisticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
cookieTypes.marketingDesc: Used to track visitors across websites for marketing purposes

section5.title: Data Security
section5.content1: We have implemented appropriate physical, technical, and administrative security measures to protect your personal data from accidental loss, unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
section5.content2: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

section6.title: Your Rights
section6.content1: Depending on your location, you may have various rights regarding your personal data, including:

list.item1: The right to access and receive a copy of your personal data
list.item2: The right to correct inaccurate personal data
list.item3: The right to request deletion of your personal data
list.item4: The right to restrict or object to our processing of your personal data

section7.title: GDPR Compliance
section7.content1: For users in the European Union, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This means you have additional rights regarding your personal data.
section7.content2: As a data subject in the EU, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, object to processing, and data portability. You also have the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing.

gdprRights.title: Your GDPR Rights in Detail
gdprRights.rightToAccess: Right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
gdprRights.rightToRectification: Right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete.
gdprRights.rightToErasure: Right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
gdprRights.rightToRestrict: Right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
gdprRights.rightToObject: Right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
gdprRights.rightToDataPortability: Right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
gdprRights.timeframe: We will respond to all legitimate requests within one month.

dataTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
dataTransfers.content: We may transfer your personal data to countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). When we do, we ensure a similar degree of protection is afforded to it by implementing safeguards like Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data on the following legal bases:
legalBasis.consent: Consent – You have given clear consent for us to process your personal data for a specific purpose.
legalBasis.contract: Contract – The processing is necessary for a contract we have with you.
legalBasis.legalObligation: Legal obligation – The processing is necessary for us to comply with the law.
legalBasis.vitalInterests: Vital interests – The processing is necessary to protect someone's life.
legalBasis.publicTask: Public task – The processing is necessary for us to perform a task in the public interest.
legalBasis.legitimateInterests: Legitimate interests – The processing is necessary for our legitimate interests or the legitimate interests of a third party unless there is a good reason to protect your personal data which overrides those legitimate interests.

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer
dpo.content: We have appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) who is responsible for overseeing questions in relation to this privacy policy. If you have any questions about this privacy policy, including any requests to exercise your legal rights, please contact our DPO at dpo@5gphones.be.

section8.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
section8.content1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
section8.content2: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, or if you would like to exercise any of your data protection rights, please contact us.

footer.description: 5GPhones is your one-stop shop for all things mobile. We offer a wide range of products and services, including phone repairs, accessories, and the latest smartphones.
footer.newsletterDescription: Stay updated with our latest products, services, and promotions.
footer.subscriptionError: Failed to subscribe. Please try again.
footer.checkOutDeals: Check out our exclusive deals and limited-time offers

sustainability.heroSubtitle: Taking meaningful actions today for a greener tomorrow in Belgium and beyond
sustainability.co2ReductionText: CO₂ emissions saved through our practices
sustainability.recyclingDesc1: Mobile phone screens contain valuable rare materials like indium and gold that can be extracted and reused. Our specialized recycling process ensures these materials don't end up in landfills.
sustainability.recyclingDesc2: When you bring your old devices to us, we properly dismantle them and send the components to certified Belgian recycling facilities. This process reduces the need for environmentally harmful mining and helps create a circular economy.
sustainability.rareMetalsText: Recovering indium and other precious metals reduces harmful mining impact
sustainability.wasteReductionText: Every recycled screen keeps hazardous materials out of landfills
sustainability.energySavingText: Recycling uses up to 85% less energy than producing new screens
sustainability.batteryProgramDesc: Our comprehensive battery recycling program ensures lithium-ion batteries from phones and electronic devices are safely processed to extract cobalt, lithium, and other materials for reuse.
sustainability.batteryPoint1: Safe collection points at all our locations
sustainability.carbonNeutralDesc: We've partnered with eco-conscious delivery services in Belgium to offer carbon-neutral shipping options, using electric vehicles and carbon offset programs.
sustainability.carbonPoint2: Carbon offset program for longer distances
sustainability.refurbishedDesc: Our certified refurbishment program extends the life of devices that might otherwise become waste, reducing manufacturing demands and their associated environmental impacts.
sustainability.refurbishedPoint1: Quality testing and repair by certified technicians
sustainability.refurbishedPoint3: Trade-in options for customers' old devices
sustainability.treePlantingDesc: For every major repair service, we contribute to reforestation efforts in Belgium and around the world, partnering with local environmental organizations.
sustainability.treePlantingPoint1: Over 2,000 trees planted since program launch
sustainability.treePlantingPoint2: Focus on native Belgian species in local forests
sustainability.treePlantingPoint3: Tracking system for customers to monitor their tree's growth
sustainability.impactDesc: We're committed to transparency in our environmental efforts. Here's how our initiatives are making a difference in Belgium and globally.
sustainability.materialRecoveryDesc: Through our recycling programs, we've recovered significant amounts of valuable materials that would otherwise be lost in landfills:
sustainability.communityImpactDesc: Our sustainability efforts extend beyond our stores to positively impact the Belgian community:
sustainability.communityPoint1: Educational workshops on e-waste management in 15 local schools
sustainability.communityPoint2: Partnership with Leuven municipality for community e-waste collection events
sustainability.communityPoint3: Donation of refurbished devices to underprivileged communities
sustainability.partnersDesc: We collaborate with leading environmental organizations and maintain certifications that reflect our commitment to sustainable business practices.
sustainability.r2Cert: Standard for electronics recycling and refurbishment
sustainability.ecoLabelDesc: Recognized for outstanding environmental practices in Belgium
sustainability.recupelDesc: Belgian organization for collection and processing of e-waste
sustainability.natuurpuntDesc: Partner for our tree planting initiatives in Flemish forests
sustainability.circularDesc: Collaboration to promote circular business models
sustainability.getInvolvedTitle: Get Involved in Our Sustainability Efforts
sustainability.getInvolvedDesc: There are many ways you can participate in and support our environmental initiatives.
sustainability.recycleDeviceDesc: Bring your old phones and electronics to any of our locations for proper recycling, even if you don't need repairs.
sustainability.buyRefurbishedDesc: Extend the life cycle of electronics by purchasing certified refurbished devices with our quality guarantee.
sustainability.spreadAwarenessDesc: Help us educate others about the importance of e-waste recycling and sustainable electronics usage.
sustainability.faqDesc: Learn more about our sustainability initiatives and how you can contribute.
sustainability.faq1Question: How do you ensure proper recycling of device components?
sustainability.faq1Answer: We work exclusively with certified recycling partners in Belgium who meet the highest environmental standards. Every component is tracked through our system to ensure it reaches the appropriate recycling facility. We conduct regular audits of our partners' facilities and processes to maintain compliance with both Belgian and EU environmental regulations.
sustainability.faq2Question: What happens to the data on recycled devices?
sustainability.faq2Answer: All devices that enter our recycling program undergo a secure data wiping process that meets GDPR requirements and industry standards for data destruction. We provide a certificate of data erasure upon request, giving you peace of mind that your personal information has been properly handled.
sustainability.faq3Question: Can I recycle any brand or type of device with you?
sustainability.faq3Answer: Yes! We accept all brands, models, and types of electronic devices for recycling - not just phones. This includes tablets, laptops, smartwatches, wireless earbuds, and other small electronics. Even if the device is completely non-functional, the materials can still be recovered and recycled properly.
sustainability.faq4Question: Do you offer any incentives for recycling old devices?
sustainability.faq4Answer: Absolutely! When you recycle a device with us, you'll receive a discount voucher for future repairs or purchases. For devices that still have some value, our trade-in program offers store credit or cash depending on the condition and model of your device.
sustainability.ctaTitle: Join Us in Making a Difference
sustainability.ctaText: Every recycled device contributes to a more sustainable future for Belgium and our planet. Start your environmental journey with us today.

offers.title: Special Offers
offers.subtitle: Exclusive deals and limited-time offers
offers.noDiscounts: No active discounts at the moment
offers.noRefurbishedProducts: No refurbished products on sale right now
offers.checkBackLater: Check back later for new discounts and special deals

returnsPolicy.title: Returns & Refunds Policy
returnsPolicy.subtitle: Information about our return process, eligibility, and refund procedures
returnsPolicy.introduction: At 5GPhones, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not entirely happy with your order, we're here to help.

returnEligibility.title: Return Eligibility
returnEligibility.point2: Items must be unused and in original packaging
returnEligibility.point3: Some items are non-returnable (software, custom items)

returnProcess.title: Return Process
returnProcess.point1: Log in and request through 'My Orders'
returnProcess.point2: Ship items back using our return label
returnProcess.point3: Track return status in your account

specialCases.title: Special Cases
specialCases.point2: Incorrect items: Replacement or full refund

section1.title: Return Eligibility
section1.content1: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items purchased from our store. To be eligible for a return, the item must be unused, in its original packaging, and in the same condition as when you received it.
section1.nonReturnable4: Items marked as non-returnable at the time of purchase
section1.nonReturnable5: Items with broken seals, unless defective

section2.title: Return Process
section2.content1: To start a return, please follow these steps:
section2.process1: Log in to your account and navigate to 'My Orders'.
section2.process2: Select the order containing the item(s) you wish to return.
section2.process3: Click on 'Return Items' and select the specific products.
section2.process4: Choose your return reason and preferred refund method.
section2.process5: Print the return shipping label provided (if applicable).
section2.process6: Package the item(s) securely with all original packaging and components.
section2.process7: Ship the package using the provided label or your preferred carrier.
section2.content2: You can track your return status in your account under 'My Returns'.

section3.title: Refunds
section3.content1: After we receive and inspect your return, we will process your refund. The refund will be issued to your original payment method unless otherwise specified.
section3.refundTime1: Credit card refunds: 5-10 business days to appear on your statement
section3.content3: If you haven't received your refund within the expected timeframe, please check your bank account again, then contact your credit card company or bank. It can sometimes take time for refunds to be officially posted.

section4.title: Damaged or Incorrect Items
section4.content1: If you receive damaged or incorrect items, please contact our customer service team within 48 hours of delivery. To expedite the process, please:
section4.damagedProcess1: Take clear photos of the damaged items or packaging
section4.damagedProcess2: Include your order number when contacting us
section4.damagedProcess3: Keep all original packaging until the issue is resolved
section4.content2: For damaged or incorrect items, we will arrange for a replacement or issue a full refund including any shipping charges incurred.

section5.title: Return Shipping Costs
section5.content1: For standard returns (change of mind), customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless otherwise stated.
section5.content2: We provide free return shipping in these cases:
section5.freeReturn4: Products covered by specific promotions offering free returns
section5.content3: To use our pre-paid return label (when applicable), please select this option during the return initiation process in your account.

section6.title: Repair Services Returns
section6.content1: For repair services, different return terms apply:
section6.repairReturn1: If you're unsatisfied with a repair, please contact us within 7 days of service completion
section6.repairReturn2: All repairs include a 90-day warranty on both parts and labor
section6.repairReturn3: If the same issue recurs within the warranty period, we'll fix it at no additional cost
section6.repairReturn4: Our warranty doesn't cover new damage, water damage, or software issues unrelated to the original repair
section6.content2: For warranty service, bring your device to any of our locations with your repair receipt or warranty information.

section7.title: Contact Us
section7.content1: If you have any questions about our return policy, please contact us:

myDevices.noDevicesDescription: You haven't submitted any devices for trade-in yet. Sell your old phone and get cash instantly.
myDevices.tryAgainLater: An error occurred. Please try again later.

tradeIn.title: Sell Your Phone
tradeIn.subtitle: Get instant cash for your old device
tradeIn.myDevicesSubtitle: Track the status of your trade-ins
tradeIn.selectDeviceDescription: Select the device you want to sell
tradeIn.phoneConditionDescription: Tell us about the condition of your phone
tradeIn.descriptionPlaceholder: Add any additional information about your device...
tradeIn.uploadImagesDesc: Upload up to 6 clear photos of your device. Include front, back, and any damage.
tradeIn.imageRequirement: Images should clearly show the condition of the device
tradeIn.uploadPhotoDescription: Upload up to 6 photos showing your device from different angles, including any visible damage
tradeIn.tradeInSuccess: Your trade-in request has been successfully submitted! You can check the status in the My Devices section.
tradeIn.fetchError: Error loading data. Please try again.
tradeIn.missingInformation: Please fill in all required information
tradeIn.estimateError: Error calculating estimate. Please try again.

recycle.environmentalDesc: Prevent harmful materials from ending up in landfills and reduce the need for raw material mining.
recycle.certifiedDesc: Our recycling partners follow strict environmental guidelines and data security protocols.
recycle.freePickupDesc: We offer convenient pickup options for multiple devices, making recycling effortless for you.
recycle.step1Desc: Tell us what devices you want to recycle using our easy online form. We accept phones, tablets, laptops, and other electronics.
recycle.step2Desc: Choose whether you'd like us to pick up the device from your location or if you prefer to drop it off at one of our recycling centers.
recycle.step3Desc: All devices undergo certified data wiping procedures to ensure your personal information is completely removed and unrecoverable.
recycle.step4Desc: Your devices are broken down and recycled following strict environmental standards. We'll send you a certificate of recycling upon completion.

seo.siteTitle: 5GPhones Leuven - Your One-Stop Shop for 5G Phones & Accessories
seo.siteDescription: Discover the latest 5G smartphones, professional repair services, premium accessories, and refurbished devices. Expert technicians, quality parts, and competitive prices in Belgium.
seo.homeDescription: Shop the latest 5G smartphones, book expert repair services, and find premium accessories. Professional device repair, trade-in programs, and certified refurbished phones in Belgium.
seo.productsDescription: Browse our extensive collection of 5G smartphones, cases, screen protectors, chargers, and premium mobile accessories from top brands.
seo.repairDescription: Expert smartphone repair services with same-day service, quality parts, 90-day warranty, and certified technicians. Book your repair appointment today.
seo.aboutDescription: Learn about 5GPhones, Belgium's trusted mobile technology experts providing sales, repairs, and accessories with exceptional customer service since our founding.
seo.contactDescription: Contact our mobile technology experts for product advice, repair consultations, or customer support. Visit our Leuven store or reach out online.
seo.sustainabilityDescription: Discover our commitment to environmental sustainability through device recycling, refurbishment programs, and eco-friendly practices in mobile technology.

sustainability.title: Environmental Sustainability & Responsible Technology | 5GPhones
sustainability.description: Learn about 5GPhones' commitment to environmental sustainability through device recycling programs, refurbishment initiatives, and eco-friendly practices reducing e-waste in Belgium.
sustainability.keywords: environmental sustainability, device recycling, eco-friendly technology, refurbished phones, e-waste reduction, green technology, sustainable mobile devices, responsible technology

returns.title: Returns & Refunds Policy | 5GPhones
returns.description: Learn about 5GPhones' return and refund policy. Easy returns within 30 days, hassle-free process, and customer satisfaction guarantee for all purchases.
returns.keywords: returns policy, refunds, return process, customer satisfaction, 30-day returns, hassle-free returns, purchase protection

categories.title: Shop by Category | 5GPhones
categories.description: Browse all product categories at 5GPhones. Find smartphones, tablets, laptops, smartwatches, headphones, and accessories organized by category for easy shopping.
categories.keywords: product categories, smartphones by category, mobile device categories, electronics categories, phone accessories, tech products, device types

brands.title: Shop by Brand | 5GPhones
brands.description: Explore products from top technology brands at 5GPhones. Find smartphones, accessories, and electronics from Apple, Samsung, Google, Xiaomi, and other leading manufacturers.
brands.keywords: technology brands, smartphone brands, Apple products, Samsung devices, Google Pixel, Xiaomi phones, brand shopping, manufacturer products

seo.termsDescription: Read our comprehensive terms and conditions covering product sales, repair services, warranties, and customer policies at 5GPhones.
seo.privacyTitle: Privacy Policy - How We Protect Your Information
seo.privacyDescription: Learn how 5GPhones collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Our comprehensive privacy policy ensures your data security.
seo.tradeInTitle: Trade-In Your Old Phone - Get Cash for Your Device
seo.tradeInDescription: Get instant quotes for your old smartphone. Trade in your device for cash or credit towards a new purchase. Free evaluation and secure data wiping.
seo.refurbishedDescription: Shop certified refurbished smartphones with warranty. Quality tested devices at affordable prices with professional refurbishment and guaranteed performance.
seo.searchTitle: Search Results - Find Your Perfect Device
seo.searchDescription: Search results for smartphones, accessories, and services. Find exactly what you need with our advanced search and filtering options.
seo.cartTitle: Shopping Cart - Review Your Mobile Technology Order
seo.cartDescription: Review your selected smartphones, accessories, and services before checkout. Secure payment options and fast shipping available.
seo.checkoutDescription: Complete your purchase with our secure checkout. Multiple payment options, fast shipping, and customer protection guaranteed.
seo.accountDescription: Manage your account settings, view order history, track repairs, and update your preferences. Access your complete 5GPhones profile.
seo.ordersDescription: View your complete order history, track current orders, and manage returns. Access all your 5GPhones purchase information.
seo.repairStatusTitle: Repair Status - Track Your Device Repair
seo.repairStatusDescription: Check the status of your device repair, view repair progress, and get updates on completion times. Professional repair tracking system.
